text: Sivaram Murthy from the Indian Institute of Technology- Madras, Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India was named Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2012 for contributions to resource management in high performance real-time computing and communication systems. == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:Engineers from Tamil Nadu Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Sivaram Murthy
